titleStmt.title: Seldome cleanely, or, A merry new ditty, wherein you may see, the tricke of a huswife, in every degree ... : to the tune of, Vpon a summers time.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright junior, dwelling at the upper end of the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the University of Glasgow. Library.

place.placeName: the upper end of the Old Baily
